name: Versatile Clafoutis

ingredients.name: Prepared fruit (cherries, berries, peaches, apples, etc.)

directions: Preheat oven to 350°F (177°C) and place rack in the center.
Add butter to a 2–3 qt baking dish or 10-inch ovenproof skillet and place in oven 4–6 minutes to melt.
In a blender, combine eggs, milk, 1/3 cup sugar, vanilla, lemon zest, and salt. Blend on medium speed until frothy, about 2 minutes.
Add flour and blend briefly on low just until smooth.
Remove dish from oven, pour in batter, and quickly arrange fruit evenly over top.
Sprinkle remaining 2 tbsp sugar over the fruit.
Bake 25–35 minutes, until puffed and golden brown.
Cool slightly, dust with powdered sugar if desired, and serve warm or at room temperature.
